title: The quantum of Transferable Development Rights (TDR) generated for Bio Diversity Park reservation shall be 8% of gross area
clause_text: The quantum of Transferable Development Rights (TDR) generated for Bio Diversity Park reservation shall be 8% of gross area.
section: Generation of the Transferable Development Rights (TDR)
